name: Auto Mechanic Sim
description:
Auto Mechanic Sim is an exciting game that puts you in the driver's seat of a car service business.

As the player, you will take on the role of the auto mechanic and manage every aspect of the business, from buying cars at auctions to servicing them to make sure they are in tip-top condition. Unfortunately, as we are not a car service over the years, it is possible that some cars remain with some unresolved defects. The game offers a realistic and immersive experience where you can work on a wide range of cars, from classic muscle cars to modern sports cars.

Your success in the game will depend on how well you manage your resources and deliver high-quality services to your customers.
As you do your job well and build a solid reputation in the community, more and more cars will start to roll into your parking lot, and your business will grow exponentially.

So get ready to roll up your sleeves, grab your toolbox, and start your journey to become the ultimate auto mechanic in Auto Mechanic Sim.

Game Features :
- Multiple languages ( English,Russian,Chinese and more other)
- Realistic car parts
- Special car auction
